description: Support to the Strategic Plan of the National Response to the HIV/AIDS epidemics in prevention activities among IDU, SWn

subproject.description: The Round 4 Grant of HIV Components focuses on expanding the activities on prevention of HIV among three vulnerable populations – migrants and their families, prisoners and street children.  The HIV/AIDS component also plans for the provision of suitable care for people living with HIV/AIDS. In additions it concentrates at raising awareness of targeted and general population on HIV/AIDS. Under the grant PIU will conduct national sociological survey to identify to assess overall situation of HIV spread in Tajikistan. The grant is being implemented under close partnership with of national, international as well as civil society institutions to contribute to the overall goal of reducing HIV/AIDS burden in Tajikistan.  Grant duration is 5 years, from 2005 to 2009 .
subproject.title: Reducing burden of HIV/AIDS

title: SUPPORT TO IMPELEMENT NR
